summary: A battle-tested Front End Engineer based in Bali, Indonesia, boasting over 12 years of expertise in crafting and deploying user-friendly and visually captivating web applications. Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and contemporary JS frameworks like React, Next.js, Angular, among others.

workExperiences.title: Web Software Engineer
achievements: Enhanced the performance of job and employer marketplace websites by 20-30%, leading to improved search engine rankings
Overhauled, designed, and collaborated in the ongoing maintenance of an internal design system project to enhance the productivity of product engineer
Implemented and incorporated automation for integration and end-to-end tests into release pipelines, effectively averting the introduction of 60%-70% critical bugs post-deployment

workExperiences.title: Senior Engineer
achievements: Played a key role in the development of the product platform migration tool, facilitating the transition from O365 to our proprietary cloud infrastructure. This significantly influenced hesitant customers, as it enabled them to import their existing projects seamlessly without the need to initiate from the beginning
Played a key role in standardizing the UI/UX across Nintex products, leading to seamless integration between them and projecting a more professional company image
Participated in initial research efforts aimed at enhancing product accessibility (A11y) to promote inclusivity and ensure compliance with relevant laws

workExperiences.title: Senior Engineer (Contract)
achievements: Participated in the development of an interactive and comprehensive parcel management application utilized by DHL Customer Service Agents to enhance productivity and efficiency
Implemented test automation within the team to enhance confidence and reliability in the delivery of features

workExperiences.title: Senior Technical Consultant
achievements: Transferred the code base from AngularJS to Angular, concurrently delivering new features to enhance developer experience and code maintainability
Played a role in the development of a centralized media hub, aiding our broadcasting clients in more efficient management of their media and digital assets, leading to enhanced user satisfaction
Provided guidance and mentorship to junior engineers within the team

workExperiences.title: Senior Analyst Programmer
achievements: Implemented a comprehensive full-text search feature for the automatic data capturing application (STREAM). This functionality allows GfK's internal and external auditors to conduct faster and more accurate data audits from retailers
Enhanced the client data synchronization performance of the STREAM app to encourage user engagement, resulting in increased data flow for monetization purposes
Promoted from Analyst Programmer to Senior Analyst Programmer

workExperiences.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Played a role in the development of a material tracking application for Western Digital, leading to a 30% increase in the productivity of their engineers
Played a role in the creation of a quality tracking reporting dashboard for Western Digital, offering improved insights into overall quality and actionable items
